page.para: Lit/tle Sock falls out of the wash bas/ket!
Lit/tle Sock won/ders how he will get home.
Lit/tle Sock asks Mouse how to get home.
Mouse does not know the way home.
Lit/tle Sock asks Spi/der how to get home.
Spi/der does not know the way home.
Lit/tle Sock sees a mar/ble roll a/way.
The mar/ble rolls to/wards Lit/tle Sockâ€™s home.
Lit/tle Sock is home and he is ver/y hap/py!
